data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Aşgabat, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Aşgabat, Turkmenistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Aşgabat that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Aşgabat, Turkmenistan to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Aşgabat, Turkmenistan to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Baloch, Western people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Aşgabat, Turkmenistan to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Father, may the churches in Aşgabat, Turkmenistan honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.section_summary:
the state of Aşgabat, Turkmenistan has a population of 1,032,000.

We estimate Aşgabat has 1,149 people who might know Jesus, 38,491 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 992,361 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 898 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Aşgabat, Turkmenistan. Please, stir the 1,149 believers here to pray for awakening.
